original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u WHERE p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=23 AND u.DownVotes=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=244
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -1 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 23)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes = 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 244)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E3.Id)
